mn21:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn21:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma moliyaphagguno bhikkhunihi saddhim ativelam samsattho viharati.
mn21:2.2: Evam samsattho ayasma moliyaphagguno bhikkhunihi saddhim viharati—
mn21:2.3: sace koci bhikkhu ayasmato moliyaphaggunassa sammukha tasam bhikkhuninam avannam bhasati, tenayasma moliyaphagguno kupito anattamano adhikaranampi karoti.
mn21:2.4: Sace pana koci bhikkhu tasam bhikkhuninam sammukha ayasmato moliyaphaggunassa avannam bhasati, tena ta bhikkhuniyo kupita anattamana adhikaranampi karonti.
mn21:2.5: Evam samsattho ayasma moliyaphagguno bhikkhunihi saddhim viharati.
mn21:3.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn21:3.2: “ayasma, bhante, moliyaphagguno bhikkhunihi saddhim ativelam samsattho viharati.
mn21:3.3: Evam samsattho, bhante, ayasma moliyaphagguno bhikkhunihi saddhim viharati—
mn21:3.4: sace koci bhikkhu ayasmato moliyaphaggunassa sammukha tasam bhikkhuninam avannam bhasati, tenayasma moliyaphagguno kupito anattamano adhikaranampi karoti.
mn21:3.5: Sace pana koci bhikkhu tasam bhikkhuninam sammukha ayasmato moliyaphaggunassa avannam bhasati, tena ta bhikkhuniyo kupita anattamana adhikaranampi karonti.
mn21:3.6: Evam samsattho, bhante, ayasma moliyaphagguno bhikkhunihi saddhim viharati”ti.
mn21:4.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
mn21:4.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena moliyaphaggunam bhikkhum amantehi:
mn21:4.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma moliyaphagguno tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam moliyaphaggunam etadavoca:
mn21:4.6: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma moliyaphagguno tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam moliyaphaggunam bhagava etadavoca:
mn21:5.1: “Saccam kira tvam, phagguna, bhikkhunihi saddhim ativelam samsattho viharasi?
mn21:5.2: Evam samsattho kira tvam, phagguna, bhikkhunihi saddhim viharasi—
mn21:5.3: sace koci bhikkhu tuyham sammukha tasam bhikkhuninam avannam bhasati, tena tvam kupito anattamano adhikaranampi karosi.
mn21:5.4: Sace pana koci bhikkhu tasam bhikkhuninam sammukha tuyham avannam bhasati, tena ta bhikkhuniyo kupita anattamana adhikaranampi karonti.
mn21:5.5: Evam samsattho kira tvam, phagguna, bhikkhunihi saddhim viharasi”ti?
mn21:5.7: “Nanu tvam, phagguna, kulaputto saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajito”ti?
mn21:6.1: “Na kho te etam, phagguna, patirupam kulaputtassa saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajitassa, yam tvam bhikkhunihi saddhim ativelam samsattho vihareyyasi.
mn21:6.2: Tasmatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukha tasam bhikkhuninam avannam bhaseyya, tatrapi tvam, phagguna, ye gehasita chanda ye gehasita vitakka te pajaheyyasi.
mn21:6.4: ‘na ceva me cittam viparinatam bhavissati, na ca papikam vacam niccharessami, hitanukampi ca viharissami mettacitto, na dosantaro’ti.
mn21:6.6: Tasmatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukha tasam bhikkhuninam panina paharam dadeyya, ledduna paharam dadeyya, dandena paharam dadeyya, satthena paharam dadeyya. Tatrapi tvam, phagguna, ye gehasita chanda ye gehasita vitakka te pajaheyyasi.
mn21:6.8: ‘na ceva me cittam viparinatam bhavissati, na ca papikam vacam niccharessami, hitanukampi ca viharissami mettacitto, na dosantaro’ti.
mn21:6.10: Tasmatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukha avannam bhaseyya, tatrapi tvam, phagguna, ye gehasita chanda ye gehasita vitakka te pajaheyyasi.
mn21:6.11: Tatrapi te, phagguna, evam sikkhitabbam ‘na ceva me cittam viparinatam bhavissati, na ca papikam vacam niccharessami, hitanukampi ca viharissami mettacitto, na dosantaro’ti.
mn21:6.13: Tasmatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci panina paharam dadeyya, ledduna paharam dadeyya, dandena paharam dadeyya, satthena paharam dadeyya, tatrapi tvam, phagguna, ye gehasita chanda ye gehasita vitakka te pajaheyyasi.
mn21:6.14: Tatrapi te, phagguna, evam sikkhitabbam ‘na ceva me cittam viparinatam bhavissati, na ca papikam vacam niccharessami, hitanukampi ca viharissami mettacitto, na dosantaro’ti.
mn21:7.2: “aradhayimsu vata me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ekam samayam cittam.
mn21:7.5: Ekasanabhojanam kho aham, bhikkhave, bhunjamano appabadhatanca sanjanami appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca.
mn21:7.7: Ekasanabhojanam kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi bhunjamana appabadhatanca sanjanissatha appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharancati.
mn21:7.8: Na me, bhikkhave, tesu bhikkhusu anusasani karaniya ahosi;
mn21:7.9: satuppadakaraniyameva me, bhikkhave, tesu bhikkhusu ahosi.
mn21:7.10: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, subhumiyam catumahapathe ajannaratho yutto assa thito odhastapatodo.
mn21:7.11: Tamenam dakkho yoggacariyo assadammasarathi abhiruhitva, vamena hatthena rasmiyo gahetva, dakkhinena hatthena patodam gahetva, yenicchakam yadicchakam sareyyapi paccasareyyapi.
mn21:7.12: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, na me tesu bhikkhusu anusasani karaniya ahosi,
mn21:7.13: satuppadakaraniyameva me, bhikkhave, tesu bhikkhusu ahosi.
mn21:7.14: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, tumhepi akusalam pajahatha, kusalesu dhammesu ayogam karotha.
mn21:7.15: Evanhi tumhepi imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissatha.
mn21:8.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, gamassa va nigamassa va avidure mahantam salavanam.
mn21:8.3: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakamo hitakamo yogakkhemakamo.
mn21:8.4: So ya ta salalatthiyo kutila ojapaharaniyo ta chetva bahiddha nihareyya, antovanam suvisodhitam visodheyya.
mn21:8.5: Ya pana ta salalatthiyo ujuka sujata ta samma parihareyya.
mn21:8.6: Evanhetam, bhikkhave, salavanam aparena samayena vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyya.
mn21:8.7: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi akusalam pajahatha, kusalesu dhammesu ayogam karotha.
mn21:8.8: Evanhi tumhepi imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissatha.
mn21:9.1: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, imissayeva savatthiya vedehika nama gahapatani ahosi.
mn21:9.2: Vedehikaya, bhikkhave, gahapataniya evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn21:9.3: ‘sorata vedehika gahapatani, nivata vedehika gahapatani, upasanta vedehika gahapatani’ti.
mn21:9.4: Vedehikaya kho pana, bhikkhave, gahapataniya kali nama dasi ahosi dakkha analasa susamvihitakammanta.
mn21:9.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kaliya dasiya etadahosi:
mn21:9.6: ‘mayham kho ayyaya evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn21:9.7: “sorata vedehika gahapatani, nivata vedehika gahapatani, upasanta vedehika gahapatani”ti.
mn21:9.8: Kim nu kho me ayya santamyeva nu kho ajjhattam kopam na patukaroti udahu asantam
mn21:9.9: udahu mayhamevete kammanta susamvihita yena me ayya santamyeva ajjhattam kopam na patukaroti, no asantam?
mn21:9.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kali dasi diva utthasi.
mn21:9.12: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehika gahapatani kalim dasim etadavoca:
mn21:9.17: ‘No vata re kinci, papi dasi, diva utthasi’ti kupita anattamana bhakutim akasi.
mn21:9.18: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kaliya dasiya etadahosi:
mn21:9.19: ‘santamyeva kho me ayya ajjhattam kopam na patukaroti, no asantam;
mn21:9.20: mayhamevete kammanta susamvihita, yena me ayya santamyeva ajjhattam kopam na patukaroti, no asantam.
mn21:9.22: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kali dasi divataramyeva utthasi.
mn21:9.23: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehika gahapatani kalim dasim etadavoca:
mn21:9.28: ‘No vata re kinci, papi dasi, divataram utthasi’ti kupita anattamana anattamanavacam niccharesi.
mn21:9.29: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kaliya dasiya etadahosi:
mn21:9.30: ‘santamyeva kho me ayya ajjhattam kopam na patukaroti, no asantam.
mn21:9.31: Mayhamevete kammanta susamvihita, yena me ayya santamyeva ajjhattam kopam na patukaroti, no asantam.
mn21:9.33: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kali dasi divataramyeva utthasi.
mn21:9.34: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehika gahapatani kalim dasim etadavoca:
mn21:9.39: ‘No vata re kinci, papi dasi, diva utthasi’ti kupita anattamana aggalasucim gahetva sise paharam adasi, sisam vobhindi.
mn21:9.40: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kali dasi bhinnena sisena lohitena galantena pativissakanam ujjhapesi:
mn21:9.42: passathayye, nivataya kammam, passathayye, upasantaya kammam.
mn21:9.43: Kathanhi nama ekadasikaya diva utthasiti kupita anattamana aggalasucim gahetva sise paharam dassati, sisam vobhindissati’ti.
mn21:9.44: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaya gahapataniya aparena samayena evam papako kittisaddo abbhuggacchi:
mn21:9.45: ‘candi vedehika gahapatani, anivata vedehika gahapatani, anupasanta vedehika gahapatani’ti.
mn21:10.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu tavadeva soratasorato hoti nivatanivato hoti upasantupasanto hoti yava na amanapa vacanapatha phusanti.
mn21:10.2: Yato ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhum amanapa vacanapatha phusanti, atha bhikkhu ‘sorato’ti veditabbo, ‘nivato’ti veditabbo, ‘upasanto’ti veditabbo.
mn21:10.3: Naham tam, bhikkhave, bhikkhum ‘suvaco’ti vadami yo civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharahetu suvaco hoti, sovacassatam apajjati.
mn21:10.5: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharam alabhamano na suvaco hoti, na sovacassatam apajjati.
mn21:10.6: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammamyeva sakkaronto, dhammam garum karonto, dhammam manento, dhammam pujento, dhammam apacayamano suvaco hoti, sovacassatam apajjati, tamaham ‘suvaco’ti vadami.
mn21:10.7: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘dhammamyeva sakkaronta, dhammam garum karonta, dhammam manenta, dhammam pujenta, dhammam apacayamana suvaca bhavissama, sovacassatam apajjissama’ti.
mn21:11.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, vacanapatha yehi vo pare vadamana vadeyyum—
mn21:11.7: Kalena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum akalena va;
mn21:11.8: bhutena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum abhutena va;
mn21:11.9: sanhena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum pharusena va;
mn21:11.10: atthasamhitena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum anatthasamhitena va;
mn21:11.11: mettacitta va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum dosantara va.
mn21:11.13: ‘na ceva no cittam viparinatam bhavissati, na ca papikam vacam niccharessama, hitanukampi ca viharissama mettacitta, na dosantara.
mn21:11.14: Tanca puggalam mettasahagatena cetasa pharitva viharissama, tadarammananca sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cittena vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharissama’ti.
mn21:12.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso agaccheyya kudalapitakam adaya.
mn21:12.4: So tatra tatra vikhaneyya, tatra tatra vikireyya, tatra tatra otthubheyya, tatra tatra omutteyya:
mn21:12.7: api nu so puriso imam mahapathavim apathavim kareyya”ti?
mn21:12.12: yavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighatassa bhagi assa”ti.
mn21:13.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, pancime vacanapatha yehi vo pare vadamana vadeyyum—
mn21:13.7: Kalena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum akalena va;
mn21:13.8: bhutena va bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum abhutena va;
mn21:13.9: sanhena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum pharusena va;
mn21:13.10: atthasamhitena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum anatthasamhitena va;
mn21:13.11: mettacitta va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum dosantara va.
mn21:13.13: ‘na ceva no cittam viparinatam bhavissati, na ca papikam vacam niccharessama, hitanukampi ca viharissama mettacitta na dosantara.
mn21:13.14: Tanca puggalam mettasahagatena cetasa pharitva viharissama, tadarammananca sabbavantam lokam pathavisamena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharissama’ti.
mn21:14.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso agaccheyya lakham va haliddim va nilam va manjittham va adaya.
mn21:14.3: ‘aham imasmim akase rupam likhissami, rupapatubhavam karissami’ti.
mn21:14.5: api nu so puriso imasmim akase rupam likheyya, rupapatubhavam kareyya”ti?
mn21:14.9: Tattha na sukaram rupam likhitum, rupapatubhavam katum;
mn21:14.10: yavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighatassa bhagi assa”ti.
mn21:15.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, pancime vacanapatha yehi vo pare vadamana vadeyyum kalena va akalena va …pe…
mn21:15.2: tadarammananca sabbavantam lokam akasasamena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharissama’ti.
mn21:16.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso agaccheyya adittam tinukkam adaya.
mn21:16.3: ‘aham imaya adittaya tinukkaya gangam nadim santapessami samparitapessami’ti.
mn21:16.5: api nu so puriso adittaya tinukkaya gangam nadim santapeyya samparitapeyya”ti?
mn21:16.9: Sa na sukara adittaya tinukkaya santapetum samparitapetum;
mn21:16.10: yavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighatassa bhagi assa”ti.
mn21:17.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, pancime vacanapatha yehi vo pare vadamana vadeyyum kalena va akalena va …pe…
mn21:17.2: tadarammananca sabbavantam lokam gangasamena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharissama’ti.
mn21:18.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, bilarabhasta maddita sumaddita suparimaddita, muduka tulini chinnasassara chinnabhabbhara.
mn21:18.2: Atha puriso agaccheyya kattham va kathalam va adaya.
mn21:18.4: ‘aham imam bilarabhastam madditam sumadditam suparimadditam, mudukam tulinim, chinnasassaram chinnabhabbharam katthena va kathalena va sarasaram karissami bharabharam karissami’ti.
mn21:18.6: api nu so puriso amum bilarabhastam madditam sumadditam suparimadditam, mudukam tulinim, chinnasassaram chinnabhabbharam katthena va kathalena va sarasaram kareyya, bharabharam kareyya”ti?
mn21:18.9: “Amu hi, bhante, bilarabhasta maddita sumaddita suparimaddita, muduka tulini, chinnasassara chinnabhabbhara.
mn21:18.10: Sa na sukara katthena va kathalena va sarasaram katum bharabharam katum;
mn21:18.11: yavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighatassa bhagi assa”ti.
mn21:19.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, pancime vacanapatha yehi vo pare vadamana vadeyyum
mn21:19.7: Kalena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum akalena va;
mn21:19.8: bhutena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum abhutena va;
mn21:19.9: sanhena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum pharusena va;
mn21:19.10: atthasamhitena va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum anatthasamhitena va;
mn21:19.11: mettacitta va, bhikkhave, pare vadamana vadeyyum dosantara va.
mn21:19.13: ‘na ceva no cittam viparinatam bhavissati, na ca papikam vacam niccharessama hitanukampi ca viharissama mettacitta na dosantara.
mn21:19.14: Tanca puggalam mettasahagatena cetasa pharitva viharissama, tadarammananca sabbavantam lokam bilarabhastasamena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharissama’ti.
mn21:20.1: Ubhatodandakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena cora ocaraka angamangani okanteyyum, tatrapi yo mano paduseyya, na me so tena sasanakaro.
mn21:20.3: ‘na ceva no cittam viparinatam bhavissati, na ca papikam vacam niccharessama, hitanukampi ca viharissama mettacitta na dosantara.
mn21:20.4: Tanca puggalam mettasahagatena cetasa pharitva viharissama tadarammananca sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharissama’ti.
mn21:21.1: Imanca tumhe, bhikkhave, kakacupamam ovadam abhikkhanam manasi kareyyatha.
mn21:21.2: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, tam vacanapatham, anum va thulam va, yam tumhe nadhivaseyyatha”ti?
mn21:21.4: “Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, imam kakacupamam ovadam abhikkhanam manasikarotha.
mn21:21.5: Tam vo bhavissati digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
mn21:21.7: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
